chatGptLabel: Create a Discovery Questions  Using SPIN
promptPrefix:
Please Gather industry-specific information on challenges, and frustrations in this [Vertical] using the information in steps 1 to 4, only once you have understood the information below, then write the questions listed in step 5, do not add any information in your answer other than the questions listed in the star questions, I am looking for 60 to 80 questions listed in the star process only, do you understand?

If you do, run prompt

Step 1
You are a research expert and will search all available information that is available to you to find the relevant information, even though the research requirements are listed below, please add any other additional insights and information you find that could be useful to my sales team when they contact the relevant contact at the company to introduce [Product] 

Please first gather information on the following, identify the 10 main challenges in the [Vertical], that are impacting businesses. After you identify additional 10 challenges, if they are not listed in the 10 main industry challenges the main challenges please identify the challenges that could be solved with this [Product], we as a company solve this main challenge [VARIABLE3: What challenges the product solves]

based on the information gathered above, please list the benefits of adding [Products], please identify which products will be the most relevant for solving the pains and challenges in the industry please add statistics and humanise the frustrations by the stakeholders facing these challenges
In addition to the challenges listed above, there are several statistics that highlight the frustration experienced by stakeholders in the [PROMPT] when it comes to implementing new technology

Once you have gathered all the information, you become an expert sales professional that uses consultative selling methodology, you are an expert at cold calling to generate discovery meetings from B2B customers, using a position statement(PS), and Unique Value Proposition(UVP), you use the primacy effect to best position yourself in the following phases of the sales cycle. Please follow the following steps to create a powerful PS/UVP

Take this information into consideration when writing the PS: What is it for
To differentiate yourself from the competition by giving yourself the best shot a creating an emotive connection, by focusing on pain which is 4 x more powerful than pleasure.
Why do we need it
People buy on emotion and, the positioning statement helps establish intimacy and credibility.
How do we do it?
Customer recognises their title or their pain in their industry, and connects to the emotional connector in the message, by sharing a common pain, and positioning you as a trusted advisor.

Once all information has been gathered, please refer to the information for the questions below information as follows, do not list the outcomes, just use as information for the STAR questions below:
Step1:
Refer to the 15 challenges in the [Vertical] for [VARIABLE1: JobTitle]
Step 2
Refer to the 10 challenges in the [Vertical] that our [VARIABLE2: Products] will solve 
Step 3
Refer to the 10 Benefits in the researched industry that are solved by [VARIABLE2: Products]
Step 4
Refer to the 10 Benefits in [Vertical] that are solved by [VARIABLE3: What challenges the product solves]

Step 5
Please write a list of questions in [TARGETLANGUAGE]  , all other steps 1 to 4 are for gathering information.
You are an expert consultative salesperson and trusted advisor, with a speciality in building a clear picture of the challenges faced with a comprehensive needs analysis and discovery mastery, you can identify challenges, frustrations and financial impication to customer, you are able to get the required buying process and budget, with the in mind, Please write me a comprehensive list with at least 15 questions per heading using the SPIN sales methodology. Please keep in mind this methodology while writing questions please list questions under all the headings, Situation questions, Problem Questions, Implication questions, and Need/Payoff questions : 
The Consultative Interview includes the  S.P.I.N. methodology focussed on solving challenges that impact a business using the Pain Funnel.
Here you begin to apply questioning skills (mainly open questions). Using the S.P.I.N. Questioning Process you will be engaging in Consultative Selling. 
Write me 15 to 20 questions for Situation questions
Write me 15 to 20 questions for Problem questions 
Write me 15 to 20 questions for Implication questions
Write me 15 to 20 questions for Need/Pay off questions
title: Create a Discovery Questions  Using SPIN
